agent_utterance: On this hot, tiring Tuesday afternoon, try a ultra-brief, doable reset: 1) Drink a cold glass of water to cool down. 2) Do a 60-second quick stretch (neck rolls, shoulder shrugs, gentle forward fold). 3) Take a 2-minute easy walk or light movement to boost energy and curb cravings. 4) Rate your current urge to binge on a 0–10 scale and jot one quick note about what you’re craving and one small alternative (e.g., water, fruit, or a small protein snack). If you’re feeling very tired, you can skip to steps 1–2 and still make progress. You’ve got this.

The plan focuses on hydration, a quick physical reset, and a simple craving-tracking step to support BED management.
